title: ARAM Smurf gets a free week champion. (◡‿◡✿)
body:
ARAM Smurf proceeds to reroll, obtains another free week champion.
Again, the ARAM Smurf rerolls, and gets another free week champion. (◡‿◡✿)

The ARAM Smurf then dodges while I have my favorite champion for the first time in months. (◡‿◡✿)

F u too aram smurfs (◡‿◡✿) I don't mind playing the bad along with the good but I'm so tired of dodges the rare few times I get someone I actually enjoy playing (◡‿◡✿)
